snippet: A gunman who ambushed two Pennsylvania state troopers, killing one, hid with a rifle in a wooded lair overlooking their law enforcement barracks and opened fire during a late night shift change, the police said Monday.
lead_paragraph: A gunman who ambushed two Pennsylvania state troopers, killing one, hid with a rifle in a wooded lair overlooking their law enforcement barracks and opened fire during a late night shift change, the police said Monday.

headline.main: Pennsylvania: Ambush Came From Woods, Police Say
headline.print_headline: Pennsylvania: Ambush Came From Woods, Police Say
